item.title: Learn the Code
item.description: A good buddy of mine worked at a software company a few years ago that was moving at a breakneck pace of growth. The company was doing well, and my friend was on a software development team that was in charge of one of the core parts of the product. He enjoyed his job, but found that he was never satisfied with his boss. The team always felt overworked, tech debt rose, and eventually quite a few high-talent engineers left.
